page.title: 19Thoughts On Our Last Year
page.content: A new school year is always a nervous and exciting time.For us it was to be the last at Primary School. We were soon given jobs such as School Savings Bank or Tuck Shop helpers. House captains were elected from among us as we settled to the year's work. A harvest festival was followed by casting for the pantomime,Sleeping Beauty,eventually acclaimed by two packed houses as the best ever.The Christmas party and films all helped to make a memorable term. Spring Term ended with an Easter concert and thoughts of a five day visit to Mid-Wales in May which was a huge success. Our 6 a side netball and football,inter-school cross country,a nature quiz,chess matches,the Sports,a Folk Dance festival,a visit to our new school,a swimming gala and much else leave us with memories to treasure.
